forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of downtown San Francisco, a generally mild afternoon unfurls, kissed by mostly sunny skies and a gentle breeze guiding the day forward. The warmth ascends to a welcoming high, intertwined with the invigorating presence of winds from the west-southwest, hinting at an energetic transition as the temperature begins to slide past the zenith. Yet, this evening will weave a different spell, as the clouds roll in, cloaking the city in a soft, gray embrace that promises a comforting chill by nighttime.

As the misty embrace of the marine layer begins to creep in from the coast, the horizon holds whispers of dew, transforming the skyline into a hazy palette of muted tones. In this setting, simple joys await the discerning dweller; a stroll along the Embarcadero could reveal subtle treasures, or perhaps a visit to a local café, where the aroma of roasted coffee mingles with the cool, breezy air. As the sun fades, layer up with a light jacket to savor the crispness, for the night will carry whispers of chill that beckon for warmth without losing the thrill of those breezy gusts. Embrace the day’s latent beauty, for it houses the quiet charm of an ever-enigmatic city.
